Class AbstractXmlPropertyHandler

java.lang.Object
  name.pehl.piriti.rebind.LogFacade
      name.pehl.piriti.rebind.propertyhandler.AbstractPropertyHandler
          name.pehl.piriti.rebind.xml.propertyhandler.AbstractXmlPropertyHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrayPropertyHandler, BooleanPropertyHandler, CharacterPropertyHandler, CollectionPropertyHandler, DefaultPropertyHandler, EnumPropertyHandler, IdRefPropertyHandler, NumericPropertyHandler, StringPropertyHandler
public abstract class AbstractXmlPropertyHandler
extends AbstractPropertyHandler

Abstract base class for PropertyHandlers used for XML (de)serialization.

Version:
$LastChangedRevision: 140 $
Author:
$LastChangedBy: harald.pehl $

isValid

public boolean isValid(IndentedWriter writer,
                       PropertyContext propertyContext)
                throws UnableToCompleteException
Returns true for XmlReaders. For XmlWriters this method returns true if no XPath is used and false otherwise.

Parameters:
writer -
propertyContext -
Returns:
true for JsonReaders. For XmlWriters this method returns true if no XPath is used and false otherwise.
Throws:
UnableToCompleteException

declare

public void declare(IndentedWriter writer,
                    PropertyContext propertyContext)
             throws UnableToCompleteException
Description copied from class: AbstractPropertyHandler
Generates the variable declaration of PropertyContext#getValueVariable(). The variable is used in the remaining methods. The type of the variable will be propertyContext.getType().getParameterizedQualifiedSourceName()

Specified by:
